original: Nasepia has an appearance similar to that of most other Erniettomorphs from Namibia, with it having a leaf-like body with thin ribs and spindle-shaped bodies, however it differentiates itself from other taxa such as Pteridinium and Rangea in the sense that it has smaller petaloids and with the configuration of the ribs being sub-parallel to its axis.

original: The film centers on a reclusive wealthy family who has spent months living in virtual isolation in the family mansion to prevent their community from finding out that daughter Hélène has gotten pregnant from a one-night stand, only to have their fragile equilibrium challenged when Hélène abandons the house soon after the baby's birth to look for the father.
